allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Measure-Command { curl.exe -X POST http://localhost:3003/api/analyze -H ''Content-Type: application/json'' -d ''{""walletAddress"":""GThUX1Atko4tqhN2NaiTazWSeFWMuiUvfFnyJyUghFMJ""}'' } | Select-Object -ExpandProperty TotalSeconds")
